title: Rick Stein's tiramisu
description: Why, you may ask, do we need another recipe for tiramisu? It is now as common as apple crumble. But I was particularly taken by this one in Venice, which had elevated the pudding to a fine-dining level simply by putting it in a cocktail glass and using a whisked fatless sponge.
ingredients: 75g/2¾oz plain flour, sifted with ½ tsp baking powder
325ml/11fl oz strong espresso, at room temperature
3 tbsp Marsala, Madeira or sweet sherry
75g/2¾oz dark chocolate, minimum 70% cocoa solids, grated
